r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $6.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Ainsworth. The average
  contract duration was 0.95 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $150.7K. The longest
  contract was 6 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $6.5M.
lookup_name: 'AINSWORTH'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '6.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '152'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '19'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '50%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.84'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.3M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.95'
s421_mean_contract_value: '150.7K'
s425_max_duration: '6'
s422_max_contract_value: '6.5M'
---
